mapper.select: /* S_BBS_SETTING */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.BBS_SETTING_ID , A.MODULE_CODE , A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.DESCRIPTION , A.USE_YN , COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('MODULE', A.MODULE_CODE, 'NAME', #{LANG_CODE}) AS MODULE_NAME FROM BBS_SETTING A WHERE A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC

/* S_BBS_CATEGORY */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.CATEGORY_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.CATEGORY_NAME, #{LANG_CODE}) as CATEGORY_NAME FROM BBS_SETTING A WHERE A.USE_YN = '1' AND A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
